Example: There are zero apples left in the basket.
I have one brother.
She has two cats.
I bought three books yesterday.
He has four chairs in his room.
There are five students in the group.
She ate six cookies.
There are seven days in a week.
I need eight pencils for the class.
There are nine apples on the table.
I can count to ten in English.
Eleven students came to class today.
The clock shows twelve o’clock.
My little sister is thirteen years old.
There are fourteen chairs in the room.
I bought fifteen candies for the party.
There are twenty students in the classroom.
The bus arrives in thirty minutes.
There are one hundred pages in the book.
The city has a population of one thousand people.
